desc: Turmeric supplement for better health. Our Turamint branded lozenges taste delicious and have the highest absorption rate of any turmeric product on the market. We use the purest India turmeric concentrate and make it absorbable through the mouth. Made at an FDA approved facility. Superior turmeric

layout.text: We’re dedicated to producing the most absorbable, safe and delicious Turmeric Lozenges on the planet.
